titles.title: When I look into your holiness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I look into Your holiness, when I gaze into Your loveliness,
When all things that surround me,
Become shadows in the light of You,
When I find the joy of reaching Your heart ,
And my will becomes enthroned in Your love,
And the things that surround me,
Become shadows in the light of You,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I worship You, I worship You.
The reason I live is to worship You.
I worship You, I worship You.
The reason I live is to worship You.
